theme: The tower of Elyria stands shrouded in an eternal gloom, its crumbling stones hiding secrets that have lain undisturbed for centuries. Rumors whisper of dark rituals and forgotten knowledge sealed within its ancient walls.
player_backstory: You are a former apprentice to the mysterious Order of the Black Depths, a secretive organization obsessed with unlocking the mysteries of the arcane. Your own studies were abruptly cut short when your mentor vanished under circumstances shrouded in darkness.
player_motivation: Driven by a mix of curiosity and desperation, you've set out to retrace your mentor's steps, hoping to find answers about their disappearance and unlock the secrets hidden within Elyria's labyrinthine passages. You're convinced that only by facing whatever horrors lie within can you redeem yourself in the eyes of the Order.
